title: Design and Type Books
content:
Hello all, I was just curious what some of your favourite typography and design(layout, colour, etc) books are or titles that you would consider being essential.   
   
I am in the process of starting a little library of my own and I am always looking to check out new titles.   
   
So far:   
   
Grid Systems in Graphic Design by Muller-Brockmann   
Typographie by Emil Ruder   
Typography - Macro+Microaesthetics by Willi Kunz   
My Way to Typography by Wolfgang Weingart   
   
A friend also lent me Itten's Elements of Color which I am just starting to read.   
   
I am thinking about picking up Armin Hoffmans "Graphic Design Manual" and Wili Kunz's new type book.
